title: Episode 11: Luke on Community Pressure, Actions and Self Identification
description:
I talk with Luke about the way people's action effect what they put into the world and the way we believe ideas, if self identification matters and how our actions show and shape beliefs

REFRENCES: 

Derick Webb: 
THE VOW- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ks2Ng4yrw_0
A NEW LAW- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3Y440-ToX0Y

Joshua Harris: 
DOCUMENTARY FULL FILM: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ybYTkkQJw_M
DOCUMENTARY TRAILER: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kjV6qSeWnL0

Rhett + Link: 
RHETT'S DECONSTRUCTION STORY: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1qbna6t1bzw
LINK'S DECONSTRUCTION STORY: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w1AZhlyoD9s

Preston Sprinkle: 
JOSHUA HARRIS INTERVIEW: https://www.prestonsprinkle.com/theology-in-the-raw/2019/2/11/723-joshua-harris-on-kissing-goodbye-to-i-kissed-dating-goodbye
JULIE SLATERY INTERVRIEW: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2MvoMSoTYms

Randos Unites: 
JULIAN AND ESTHER CONVERSATION: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CL47Xtsj7C4
JEFF, SAM AND LUKE CONVERSATION: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=odhQKbFly0s

I often talk about and with individuals from the Bridges of Meaning Discord. Here is a link if you're interested in checking it out! 

BOM Discord: https://discord.gg/nJaM7B6NBJ​
